country_code.description: FIPS country code, must be a string of length 2 and is required

network_code.description: network code that identifies the station numbering system used, must be a string of length 1 and is required

station_id.description: station identifier, must be a string of length 8 and is required

year.description: is the year of the record., must be a number and is required

month.description: is the month of the record, must be a number and is required

element_type.description: is the element type., must be a string of length 4 and is required
